## HTMLView.bind() method

Binds a view's behaviors to its binding source.

**Signature:**

```typescript
bind(source: TSource, context?: ExecutionContext<TParent>): void;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</td><td>

[ExecutionContext](../fast-element.executioncontext/)<!-- -->&lt;TParent&gt;

void
